text: Alan Scott Frumin (; born December 26, 1946) is an American lawyer. He was the parliamentarian of the United States Senate from 1987 until 1995 and from 2001 until 2012. In November 2011, Frumin was included on The New Republic's list of Washington's most powerful, least famous people. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Parliamentarians of the United States Senate Category:Lawyers from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Alan Frumin
